about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the exciting world of covert operations and espionage with the game "Agents of ARGUS".
Will you be able to outwit guards, hack into defense systems and get information on which the fate of nations depends?
Or do you prefer covert surveillance in enemy territory and counter-intelligence?
Join the ARGUS Agents and prove your strength in this exciting mobile game.
"Agents of ARGUS" is an isometric stealth game that utilizes interesting game mechanics and the ability to participate in various missions and events.
*Story campaign.
Follow the story campaign full of mystery and intrigue and find out who wants to overthrow the established world order.
Disrupt the aggressor's plans and finish him once and for all!
*The Life of a Secret Agent
Become a master of stealth. Infiltrate secure facilities, bypassing the most advanced security systems and guards. Contact informants. Gather intelligence. Go undercover. Create sabotage.
*Multiple locations
Take part in a series of high-stakes missions set in locations around the world. From luxurious mansions in the Swiss Alps to the bustling cityscapes of Tokyo, each level presents a unique challenge that requires tactical skill.
*Variable playthrough
There are many different ways to complete a mission. Choose wisely - will you go straightforward or rely on your skills to become a stealthy shadow?
Find your unique path!
*Upgrade
Level up your character and his equipment to unlock his full potential!
*The latest gadgets
Arm yourself with an arsenal of high-tech gadgets, from encrypted communication scanners to magnetic gas self-shooters with hooks. Upgrade and improve your tools to stay one step ahead of ever-changing challenges.
*Interesting mini-games
Hack a variety of devices, from simple mechanical door locks to sophisticated digital defenses.
*Diverse game modes
Enjoy a variety of game modes: campaign, randomized contracts, large-scale events.
*Difficulty Levels
With three difficulty levels, players from casual to hardcore fans will find something for everyone.
*Cooperative play
Team up with friends and conquer incredible game challenges. It's fun to play together!
Join alliances and make new friends. Compete with other alliances and bring glory to your team.
*Earn rewards
Earn many Achievements and compete with other players to become the best agent and leave your mark in the history of the most powerful organization of all time.
So ARGUS Agent, are you ready to join the fight?
